name: Mazi - Remastered
description:
"Mazi-Remastered". Online is an online FPS game. 2 Teams Show Their Strength In A Competitive Environment. You can play with your friends in the game and improve your level.

3D is a strategic war game. Each match comes in XP and you improve your level. With guns and bombs, you can take out the enemy and gain the upper hand. It offers the user the best experience with its pleasant-looking designs and graphics. Have fun and Clash on a lot of maps. The guerrilla team tries to gain the upper hand in the "Mazi - Remastered" shock Team Fights The Guerrilla team who wants to prevent this superiority.
